IBT.TITLE: E-learning courses
IBT.DESCRIPTION:
In order to gain access to the courses available to you, you have to press the link below, whereafter a new page will load. Here you will have to log in with your Monsenso username and password. 

 When you have logged in, a list of available content will be displayed and can be accessed at your leisure. Please talk to your clinician, should you have any questions or concerns.
